resources.string:
Names: BTS (Bangtan Boys; Beyond The Scene) International.
Why "BTS" ?: Is the acronym for "Bangtan Boys" which means "Bulletproof Boys".
As of July 4, 2017 the meaning "Beyond The Scene" was added. Which refers to "The youth who open the door and walk towards their dream".
Origin: South Korea.
Number of Members: 7 boys.
Official Fanclub Name: A.R.M.Y.
Why "A.R.M.Y" ?: Adorable Representative M.C for Youth. The term "M.C" for rappers means "master of ceremony". A special term for rappers of a high level, through it, means that we are special for them because we are their MC and at the same time, ARMY which means "army" in English, since according to the members, their fans are the army that faithfully, and tirelessly, fight for them.
Official Color: Black and White.
" Before they debuted they already had 2,000 fans subscribed to their fan-café."
"In Jo Kwon's MV \"I'm the one\" you can see J-Hope and Jungkook dancing. Jin, V and SUGA also appear. Jimin participated in the video \"Party (XXO)\" of the former Big Hit group, GLAM. "

For their reality show, American Hustle Life, they traveled to the city of Los Angeles, in the United States. They learned about Hip Hop from artists like Coolio, Dante Evans, Nate Walka, Tony Jones, Warren G, Iris Stevenson, etc.
"His debut song \"No More Dream\" was written in 2012 by RM, SUGA and one of the former members, Donghyuk (Supreme Boi). The lyrics were rewritten by them more than 22 times. "
The song 좋아요 (I Like It) of their debut album was written by RM, SUGA and J-Hope in 40 minutes.

Their debut single 2 COOL 4 SKOOL contains two Hidden Trackso hidden songs that are not featured on the official song lists or on the official BigHit Entertainment website, these songs are Skit: On the Start Liney 길 (Road / Path) leaving the single with a total of 9 songs
"Every year for the celebration of its anniversary, the group organizes a special radio program called BTS 꿀 FM 06.13. "
On July 2, 2018, JYP Entertainment confirms that Lee Dong Wook and Suzy ended their relationship of only 4 months, after confirming it officially.
Suzy is the first Korean artist to have her own wax figure EB the Madame Tussaunds Museum in Hong Kong.
On March 8, 2018, an alleged relationship with the actor Lee Dong Wook was reported, later JYP confirmed that they are in the process of getting to know each other.
It is ranked # 51 of the 100 most beautiful faces in the world in 2017 by the TC Candler magazine.

Suzy will have her first comebakc on January 29 as soloist with a mini-album. But first a pre-release song will be released on January 22. For this comeback I travel to Los Angeles on January 1, where 4 videoclips were recorded.
" On November 16, 2017 it was announced that Suzy and Lee Min Ho had terminated their relationship of almost 3 years, JYP and MYM Entertaiment confirmed this news."
For the presentation of his solo mini-album Yes? No ?, Suzy is making a documentary program, in which he shows part of his life as well as his home, a program which is presented through Dingo

" Artist Name: Suzy
Real Name: Bae Su Ji
Profession: Singer, Composer, Dancer, Model, Actress, MC
Birthdate: 10-October-1994
Place of Birth: Gwangju, South Korea
Weight: 47Kg
Stature: 168cm
Blood type: AB
Signature: Libra
Family: Parents, big sister and younger brother
Agency: JYP Entertainment
Ex-Kpop Group: miss A (2010-2017)
Position: Vocalist, Dancer and Maknae
Favorite color: Rosa"
"On April 2, 2018 it was reported that Lee Jong Suk has established his own agency. A-man, in association with YNK Entertaiment. "
"On March 26, 2018, it was reported that after his YG Entertainmetn contract ends on March 31, he will join YNK Entertaiment. "
" Last August of 2017 Jong Suk reached 10 million followers by Instagram, being the first Korean actor with such a number of followers."
On August 10, 2017 she received a notification to be part of the army, postponed her to finish her studies and promote her VIP movie and the drama While You Were Sleeping.
"Appointed honorary ambassador of tourism in Korea on July 25, 2017. He has filmed 8 ads promoting different places in Korea. "

Name: Lee Jong Suk
Profession: Actor, Model, MC
Birthdate: 14-September-1989
Place of Birth: Suwon, Gyeonggi Province, South Korea
Weight: 65Kg
Statitude: 186cm
Blood Type: A
Signified Zodiacal: Virgo
Family: Parents and Brothers
Education: Yong Ma Elementary Schoool, Yongdong Middle School, National High School of Traditional Arts, Yangjae High School
Konkuk University: Cinema
Hobbies: Games, Basketball, Piano
Speciality: Taekwondo, songs

Name: SHINee (International) Why SHINee ?: "People who receive and emit light" (That is, they shine on their own). It is the word SHINE (Brilliant) with two E at the end to give this meaning of people who receive and emanate light.
Origin: South Korea.
Number of Members: 4 Boys
Official Fanclub Name: SHAWOL 
Why 'SHAWOL' ?: It comes from the SHINee World abbreviation.
Official Color: Pearly Bluish Green.
Agency: SM Entertainment (South Korea). Universal Music (Japan).

It has been the only Korean group to appear at the recording studios "Abbey Road Studios" in England. (Some artists who have performed there include Pink Floyd, The Beatles, Stevie Wonder, Coldplay, Adele, U2, Red Hot Chili Peppers, Queen, Michael Jackson among many others).

SHINee set a record in the Oricon music list of Japan, for the first time in 44 years of Oricon, in which a foreign artist (soloist included) released three different singles, and all three they will be classified in the Top 3. The Hit songs are "Replay", "Juliette" and later "Lucifer".
Jonghyun in all the SHINee World Concert (SWC) has interpreted Alejandro Sanz\'s song "Y Si Fuera Ella" (included in the album "SHINee World") versioning it in the Korean language.
In the song "Señorita" (from the mini album "ROMEO") they speak Spanish words.
SHINee was accused of plagiarism for the Corbin Blue song "Deal With It" that was covered by them in "Juliette" (2009), but in fact the SM bought the rights to this song.
They were in the Hello Baby! (2010), taking care of the little Jung Yoo Geun. In which Onew said he preferred the chicken Yoo Geun, because he loves chicken.
They participated as a jury in K-Pop Cover Dance Festival 2011 held in Moscow (Russia).

Jung Jae Chan (Lee Jong Suk), is a novice prosecutor, ignored in his office for certain misunderstandings, yet he says what he thinks without fear. In spite of that, he has a keenness to investigate and a strong belief in justice. Nam Hong Joo (Suzy), is a journalist capable of predicting the future in dreams, seeing even her own death. His ability has not done more than always bring problems, but everything changes to meet Jae Chan, who will also have this kind of dreams.
Jung Hae I \nlike Jan woo Tak \nSecondary Cast
Lee Sang Yeob \nlike Lee You Beom \nSecondary Cast
Lee Jong Suk \nas Jun g Jae Chna \nMain Cast
Suzy \nlike Nam Hng Koo \n Main cast
Curved Data While were you Sleeping
This is the first leading role of Kim Woo Bin.
It\'s the second time that Kim Woo Bin, Im Joo Eun and Jung Dong Hwang work together, the first time was in the drama "The Heirs".
This is the second time that Im Joo Hwan and Kim Ki Bang are colleagues, the first time was in "Boys Before Flowers".
It\'s the second time that Kim Woo Bin and Yoo Oh Seung work together, being the first time in the movie \'Friend2\'.
Second time Suzy, Kim Ki bang and Jin Kyung meet, the first time was in the drama \'Gu Family Book\'.
This is the second time Im Joo Hwang and Im Joo Eun are colleagues, we see them together for the first time in \'What\'s up? \'.
This time we see Im Joo Hwan and Kim Woo Bin working together for the second time, remember that the first was in the movie \'The Thecnicians\'.
The filming of this drama began on November 26, 2015, completed before going on the air. becoming the second KBS in which it happens, \'Descendants of the Sun\', took first place.

Kim Min Kyu (Yoo Seung Ho), genius and main shareholder of KM Financial, the largest financial company in the country. He claims not to have had a girlfriend and to be "allergic" to humans. Thus, Jo Ji Ah (Chae Soo Bin), successful entrepreneur and genius in mechanical engineering, pretends to be a robot (Aji-3), created by Professor Hong Baek Kyung (Uhm Ki Joon). Seeing you wrapped in a love triangle.
Uhm Ki Joon \nas Hong Baek \nMain Cast
Hwang Seung Eon \nas Ye Ri The \nSecondary Cast
Chae Soo Bin \nas Jo Ji Ah / AJI-3 \nMain Cast
Yoo Seung Ho \nas Kim Min Kyu \nMain Cast
I\'m not a robot: Funny scenes
Curiosities of I\'m not a robot
Screenwriter Park Hye Ryun had already worked with the two protagonists of the drama; with Lee Jong Suk in Pinocchio and I Hear Your Voice and with Suzy in Dream High.
The first reading of the script was made on January 20, 2017.
Filming began in February and ended on July 27, 2017.
Actors Lee Jong Suk, Shin Jae Ha, Yeo Hoe Hyun and Min Sung Wook had already worked together in the drama Pinocchio.
The actors Shin Jae Ha, Hwang Young Hee and Min Sung Wook had already worked together on the drama Gogh, The Starry Night.

Actress Kim So Hyun had already worked with Lee Jong Suk on I Hear Your Voice, with Shin Jae Ha and Hwang Young Hee on Page Turner and with Jung Hae In on Goblin, with the exception of this one last, dramas written by the same writer
It\'s the third time that actor Nam Da Reum plays the young version of Lee Jong Suk, the first time was in the film No Breathing and in the drama Pinocchio.
In Chapter 6, the case of the serial killer of the cats, refers to a real case occurred in France around 2016. Where also around 100 cats were poisoned by a person.
